items.title: Rivian owners will soon be able to access vehicle controls using their Apple Watch
items.content: Rivian is launching a companion app that pairs with Apple Watch in the coming week.

items.title: Apple is reportedly cooking up a trio of AI wearables
items.content: As the AI hardware space heats up, the iPhone maker has multiple smart products in development.

items.title: Apple Podcasts is getting an enhanced video experience this spring
items.content: By bringing an enhanced video podcast viewing experience to its app, Apple is aiming to keep users from turning to rival platforms to watch their favorite shows.

items.title: Apple acquires all rights to ‘Severance,’ will produce future seasons in-house
items.content: The show is expected to run for four seasons, with the possibility of spin-offs, a prequel, and foreign versions.

items.title: All the important news from the ongoing India AI Impact Summit
items.content: India is hosting a four-day AI Summit this week that will be attended by executives from major AI labs and Big Tech, including OpenAI, Anthropic, Nvidia, Microsoft, Google, an

items.title: Microsoft says Office bug exposed customers’ confidential emails to Copilot AI
items.content: Microsoft said the bug meant that its Copilot AI chatbot was reading and summarizing paying customers' confidential emails, bypassing data-protection policies.

items.title: Microsoft says hackers are exploiting critical zero-day bugs to target Windows and Office users
items.content: Critical security flaws targeting Windows and Office users allow hackers to take complete control of a victim's computer by clicking a malicious link or opening a file. Patch

items.title: How AI changes the math for startups, according to a Microsoft VP
items.content: Amanda Silver is a corporate vice president at Microsoft’s CoreAI division, where she works on tools for deploying apps and agentic systems within enterprises.

items.title: A Cancer Detection Test Fails in Major Study
items.content: A closely watched clinical trial in Britain that screened blood for early detection of cancer did not show a reduction in later stages of the disease.

items.title: U.S. Economy Grew Modestly at End of 2025
items.content: Gross domestic product expanded at a 1.4 percent annual rate in the last quarter of the year, hit by the effects of the government shutdown.

items.title: Is Blue Owl Private Credit’s ‘Canary in the Coal Mine’?
items.content: Steep declines in the shares of private lenders, after a major fund changed how investors can withdraw money, have sparked worries about more trouble to come.

items.title: Mixed Signals Churn Stock Market Despite Recent Highs
items.content: Major indexes have mostly been treading water for months, as investors’ exuberance for artificial intelligence wears off.
